junitx.framework
Class ObjectAssert

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--junitx.framework.ObjectAssert
public class ObjectAssert
extends java.lang.Object

A set of assert methods specially targetted to asserting objects.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $ $Date: 2003/04/27 02:14:33 $
Author:
Vladimir R. Bossicard

Method Summary

          Asserts that an object is an instance of a class.

Method Detail

assertInstanceOf

public static void assertInstanceOf(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.Class expected,
                                    java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object is an instance of a class. Throws an AssertionFailedError if it is not an instance of that class.

assertInstanceOf

public static void assertInstanceOf(java.lang.Class expected,
                                    java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object is an instance of a class. Throws an AssertionFailedError if it is not an instance of that class.

assertNotInstanceOf

public static void assertNotInstanceOf(java.lang.String message,
                                       java.lang.Class expected,
                                       java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object is not an instance of a class. Throws an AssertionFailedError if it is an instance of that class.

assertNotInstanceOf

public static void assertNotInstanceOf(java.lang.Class expected,
                                       java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object is not an instance of a class. Throws an AssertionFailedError if it is an instance of that class.

assertSame

public static void assertSame(java.lang.Object expected,
                              java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object are the same. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are not (including the objects' values).

assertSame

public static void assertSame(java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.Object expected,
                              java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object are the same. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are not (including the objects' values).

assertNotSame

public static void assertNotSame(java.lang.Object expected,
                                 java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object are not the same. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are.

assertNotSame

public static void assertNotSame(java.lang.String message,
                                 java.lang.Object expected,
                                 java.lang.Object actual)
Asserts that an object are not the same. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are.
